column1: Image size (128, 256, 1) in weighting T2 of the MRI, showing the head of a man of 37 years old of sagittal section. Slice n°159 is observed starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The following elements are present : the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4826.5137 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5583.2520 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 127.8809 mm³, the temporal horn of right lateral ventricle of volume 22.4121 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 270.2637 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1538.5254 mm³, the right putamen of volume 266.3086 mm³, the right hippocampus of volume 210.9375 mm³ and the right amygdala of volume 27.6855 mm³.

MRI image size (128, 256, 1) illustrating the head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, with sagittal section. We observe slice n°159 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull.
